other_tests.findings: The liver is slightly increased in echogenicity, which may reflect fatty infiltration. The CBD is increased in diameter measuring 6 mm, previously 3 mm. The gallbladder contains numerous echogenic shadowing stones with increasing wall thickening up to 4 mm but no distension and no pericholecystic fluid.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The CBD diameter increased from 3 mm to 6 mm.
